content: Any integrations using this token will no longer be able to access the API. You cannot undo this action.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when revoking an OAuth token, informing users that any integrations using the token will be disabled. The message appears in a modal dialog header.

usage.context:
>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("OAuth:RevokeDialogHeader")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <div>
 <Text style={{ marginBottom: "16px" }} noSelect>
 {t("OAuth:RevokeDialogDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text style={{ marginBottom: "16px" }} noSelect>
 {t("OAuth:RevokeDialogEnterToken")}
 </Text>
 <FieldContainer

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'token' is transliterated as 'token' instead of being translated to a more appropriate Armenian equivalent, such as 'գրանցման տոմս'. While 'token' is understandable in technical contexts, it's not ideal for broader user communication.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'token' to 'գրանցման տոմս' or a similar term that resonates better with Armenian speakers in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'API' lacks a space before the following sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change ': Դուք չեք կարող հետարկել այս գործողությունը:' to ': Դուք չեք կարող հետարկել այս գործողությունը: '

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's a space before 'ກະ' in the Lao translation. It should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ໃດໆທີ່ໃຊ້ໂຕ໊ກຽນນີ້ຈະບໍ່ສາມາດເຂົ້າໃຊ້ API ໄດ້ອີກຕໍ່ໄປ ທ່ານບໍ່ສາມາດຍົກເລີກການກະທຳນີ້ໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'marķieri' (marker) is not the most accurate translation for 'token' in this context. 'Token' refers to an authentication credential. A better translation would be 'atslēga'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jebkura integrācija, izmantojot šo atslēgu, vairs nevarēs piekļūt API. Šo darbību nevar atsaukt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Dane działanie" is grammatically incorrect and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "this action." It should be "To działanie" or "Ta akcja".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: To działanie nie może zostać cofnięte.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Soluții de integrare' is too literal and doesn't convey the meaning of 'integrations' effectively in this context. It sounds overly formal and technical for a user-facing message.
While technically correct, 'Această acțiune' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nu se poate face nimic pentru a anula această acțiune

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඒකායනතාවන්' (ekāyanaṭāvan) could be more accurately represented or simplified for better readability in a user interface. While technically correct, it's quite formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a simpler term like 'සම්බන්ධතා' (sambandhatā) or 'අයදුම්පත්' (ayadumpath) which convey the meaning of integrations more naturally in this context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'මෙම ක්‍රියාව අහෝසි කළ නොහැකි වනු ඇත' (same krīyāva ahōsi kala nahaki vanu ath) is grammatically correct but slightly formal and could be softened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more conversational phrasing like 'ඔබට මෙය පෙරළා ගත නොහැකිය' (obata meya perala geta nokiyada).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'API-ју' is using the incorrect case. While technically acceptable, 'API' is usually not capitalized in Serbian unless it's part of a proper name.  It's more consistent to use 'API'.

The Serbian translation 'Bilo koje integracije koje koriste ovaj token više neće imati pristup API-ju' is a literal translation that sounds slightly unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Sve integracije koje koriste ovaj token više neće moći da pristupe API-ju.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sve integracije koje koriste ovaj token više neće moći da pristupe API-ju.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian word 'ponišiti' (to undo/reverse) is grammatically correct but 'olakšati' or 'odustati' might feel more natural in this context, depending on the desired tone.  'Poništiti' carries a stronger sense of complete reversal.

The translation '使用此令牌的任何集成都将无法访问 API。您无法撤销此操作。' is a literal translation, but it doesn't flow naturally in Chinese. The phrase '令牌' (token) is technically correct, but in this context, '密钥' (key) might be more appropriate for a broader audience. The sentence structure is also slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 使用此密钥的任何集成都将无法访问 API。此操作不可逆转。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses two sentences separated by a period. While grammatically correct, the original English content is a single sentence. This creates a slightly different tone. Combining them could improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 使用此密钥的任何集成都将无法访问 API，此操作不可逆转。
